networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please try again later.
unauthorized: You need to be signed in to access this feature

chat.rateLimitExceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
chat.requestFailed: Failed to get response. Please try again.
chat.unexpectedError: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

tts.tokenRequired: A valid TTS token from chat generation is required to generate audio.
tts.invalidToken: The provided TTS token is invalid or has been used.
tts.tokenAlreadyUsed: Token already used but no cached audio available
tts.textTooLong: Text must be 4096 characters or less
tts.generationFailed: Failed to generate speech. Please try again.
tts.playbackError: Error occurred during text-to-speech playback. Audio error: {error}
